Package se.kth.iv1350.retailStore.model

Class Payment

java.lang.Object
se.kth.iv1350.retailStore.model.Payment
public class Payment extends Object
The Payment class is responsible for handling paymen. It calculates total price, VAT, and discounted price. It also manages the amount paid by the customer and calculates the change to be returned.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Payment

      public Payment()
      Constructor that initializes the total price as 0. The Payment class is used to calculate and store the total price, VAT, discounts and change for a sale.

    • Payment

      public Payment(Payment payment)
      Copy constructor that creates a new Payment object based on an existing one. This constructor is used to create a copy of the payment object.
      Parameters:
      payment - The Payment object to copy.

  • Method Details

    • calculateTotalPrice

      public AmountDTO calculateTotalPrice(List<ItemDTO> itemList)
      Calculates the total price, VAT, and VAT percentage for the items in the sale. Loops through each item to calculate the total price, VAT, and average VAT percentage.
      Parameters:
      itemList - The list of items in the sale.
      Returns:
      The total price as an AmountDTO. the for-Loop iterates through all items and calculate the total price, VAT, and item quantity

    • returnTotalPrice

      public float returnTotalPrice()
      Returns the total price of the sale.
      Returns:
      The total price as a float.

    • returnTotalVAT

      public float returnTotalVAT()
      Returns the total VAT for the sale.
      Returns:
      The total VAT as a float.

      public float returnTotalVATPercentage()
      Returns the total VAT percentage for the sale.
      Returns:
      The VAT percentage as a float.

    • setDiscount

      public void setDiscount(float discount)
      Sets the discount percentage for the sale.
      Parameters:
      discount - The discount percentage as a float.

    • calculateDiscountedPrice

      public AmountDTO calculateDiscountedPrice()
      Calculates the discounted price based on the total price and the discount percentage.
      Returns:
      The discounted price as an AmountDTO.

    • registerAmountPaid

      public void registerAmountPaid(AmountDTO amount)
      Registers the amount paid by the customer.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount paid as an AmountDTO.

    • calculateChange

      public void calculateChange()
      Calculates the change to be returned to the customer. The change is calculated based on the amount paid and either the total price or the discounted price. If there's no discount, calculate change based on the total price If there's a discount, calculate change based on the discounted price

    • getChange

      public AmountDTO getChange()
      Returns the change to be returned to the customer.
      Returns:
      The change as an AmountDTO.

    • getAmountPaid

      public AmountDTO getAmountPaid()
      Returns the amount paid by the customer.
      Returns:
      The amount paid as an AmountDTO.
